name: University Management System
tagline: Ukraine, Lviv, Lviv National University Of Ivan Franko,
body:
### Welcome to UMS - University Management System.
This project is a part of one big reform, that started in Ukraine after revolution of dignity.It consist of several parts such as **backend**, **admission** frontend, etc.. 
This is a pilot project and it is constantly changing.
Our ultimate goal is to replace paper work in all ukrainian universities into digital one. 

Project is declared to use Java and Linux. Don't forget to install them.

### Link
Check our github page
[github.com/ifnul/ums](https://github.com/ifnul/ums)

### Technologies
To start with, we use **Java** as our backend language.We have several frameworks connected with backend, such as **Maven, Spring, JPA(Hibernate), Liquibase, Gatling**. We have **AngularJS** on top of our frontend admission part.We love to use tests, we have around 2200 unit tests and 1260 integration tests.
We use Jenkins as CI(Continuous Integration) and CD(Continuos Deployment).

[jenkins.lnu.edu.ua](http://jenkins.lnu.edu.ua/)

### Authors and Contributors
This project was started as a project of post-graduate student @ivanursul. Significant aid was made by @Illay1994
If you are willing to help us - Find me on [ivanursul.com](http://ivanursul.com/)

### Support or Contact
[ivanursul.com](http://ivanursul.com/)
